description: This year's 71st edition of the bp Statistical Review of World Energy helps to make sense of the greatest challenges and uncertainties facing the global energy system for almost 50 years
cleaned_text: The EI published the [72nd edition of the Statistical Review of World Energy](https://www.energyinst.org/statistical-review) on 26 June 2023, together with a webcast.
